drawing

Class TextNumberCompositor

  • Object
    • TextCompositor
      • TextNumberCompositor

  • public class TextNumberCompositor
extends TextCompositor
    Some Chart numbers need to be rendered in a different font than the other onscreen text. Rather than have the user specify these font characteristics, for this version of MV-CoDA, we simply double the usual font size and allow this custom text compositor to be called for these forms
    Author:
    tony
